cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)
project(external)

message("---------------------------------------------------------------------")
message(" External dependencies                                               ")
message("---------------------------------------------------------------------")
if(ENABLE_CGNS)
    add_subdirectory(cgns)
endif()

if(ENABLE_METIS)
    add_subdirectory(metis)
endif()

if(ENABLE_PARMETIS)
    add_subdirectory(parmetis)
endif()

if(ENABLE_TECIO)
    add_subdirectory(tecio/teciosrc)
endif()

# Summary
if (ENABLE_CGNS OR ENABLE_METIS OR ENABLE_PARMETIS)
    message(STATUS "Enabled the following libraries:")
endif ()
if(ENABLE_CGNS)
    message(STATUS "  CGNS     with SU2 define HAVE_CGNS")
endif()
if(ENABLE_METIS)
    message(STATUS "  METIS    with SU2 define HAVE_METIS")
endif()
if(ENABLE_PARMETIS)
    message(STATUS "  PARMETIS with SU2 define HAVE_PARMETIS")
endif()
if(ENABLE_TECIO)
    message(STATUS "  TECIO    with SU2 define HAVE_TECPLOT_API")
endif()
message(STATUS "Linking SU2 with:")
message(STATUS "  ${EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES}")
